LanguageData.OE_AuraBrigadier.label: Aura Module - Brigadier
LanguageData.OE_AuraBrigadier.description: This person is using a Aura Module - Brigadier. Everyone within an effect radius gains working stats bonuses.
LanguageData.OE_AuraBrigadierBuff.label: Aura Module - Brigadier
LanguageData.OE_AuraBrigadierBuff.description: Someone is using the Aura Module - Brigadier nearby, boosting this person's working stats bonuses.
